title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 1.1 - Regulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 1.1 - Regulation

State Regulations
A regulation is an official act of the superintendent of general application, that is, a statement of a rule applicable to future as well as existing situations, and applicable to all or any class of insurers, agents, brokers, adjusters, employees of the Insurance Department, or other persons subject to being regulated by the Superintendent of Insurance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
